Uses of Interface
org.js4ms.io.channel.MessageTransform

  • Packages that use MessageTransform 
    Package Description
    org.js4ms.amt.proxy  
    org.js4ms.io.channel  

    • Uses of MessageTransform in org.js4ms.amt.proxy

      Classes in org.js4ms.amt.proxy that implement MessageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IPv4MembershipQueryTransform
      Transforms an IPPacket object containing an IGMPv3 query message into a protocol-independent MembershipQuery object.
      class  IPv4MembershipReportTransform
      Transforms a protocol-independent MembershipReport object into an IPPacket object containing an IGMPv3 report message.
      class  IPv6MembershipQueryTransform
      Transforms an IPPacket object containing an MLDv2 query message into a protocol-independent MembershipQuery object.
      class  IPv6MembershipReportTransform
      Transforms a protocol-independent MembershipReport object into an IPPacket object containing an MLDv2 report message.

    • Uses of MessageTransform in org.js4ms.io.channel

      Fields in org.js4ms.io.channel declared as MessageTransform 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MessageTransform<OuterMessageType,InnerMessageType> OutputChannelTransform.transform
      A message transform object that will convert messages received by this channel into the messages that are then sent to the inner output channel.
      protected MessageTransform<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType> InputChannelTransform.transform
      A message transform object that will convert messages produced by the inner channel into the messages that are produced by this channel.
      Constructors in org.js4ms.io.channel with parameters of type MessageTransform 
      Constructor and Description
      InputChannelTransform(InputChannel<InnerMessageType> innerChannel, MessageTransform<InnerMessageType,OuterMessageType> transform)
      Constructs an input channel that uses the specified transform object to transform messages produced by the specified inner input channel into the message produced by this channel.
      OutputChannelTransform(OutputChannel<InnerMessageType> innerChannel, MessageTransform<OuterMessageType,InnerMessageType> transform)
